title: Retrieve a list of all business details for Subcontractor

listOfBusinesses.description: An array containing the details of all the business income sources held against the specified National insurance number.

incomeSourceId.description: A unique identifier for the business income source.

typeOfBusiness.description: The type of business income source, one of: `self-employment`, `uk-property` or `foreign-property`.

tradingName.description: The trading name of the business.
